subject: Football
Super Bowl
Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
lead_paragraph: General Manager Trent Baalke, with his meticulous scouting for the 2011 N.F.L. draft, helped to assemble the 49ers team that will play in the Super Bowl on Sunday.
snippet: General Manager Trent Baalke, with his meticulous scouting for the 2011 N.F.L. draft, helped to assemble the 49ers team that will play in the Super Bowl on Sunday.
